name: SCP:Escape
description:
The structural integrity of your bike will only hold for so long. SCP 217 has been released from containment and will destroy everything given the chance. You hold the last hope. Can you survive?

The game was originally made with the Arcade-top style joystick and buttons, but this version has been modified for use on the keyboard..

(game has now been fixed with PC controls)

Best played at 1360 x 768 and play in windowed mode. Else you're gonna have a bad time getting out of the game without ctrl+alt+delete.

A and D move left and right, spacebar boosts, and left shift brakes (hit it a few times)
